title: Gold Advances Above $5,000 as Dip-Buyers Return to Choppy Market
description: Gold advanced above $5,000 an ounce, as dip-buyers returned to the market after an exceptionally volatile week for precious metals.
content: Gold advanced above $5,000 an ounce, as dip-buyers returned to the market after an exceptionally volatile week for precious metals.
